title: Workshop on Designing Creative Language Teaching Methods for Medical Professionals

context.prior_knowledge: Basic medical knowledge, teaching experience, and foundational understanding of language pedagogy (reading, writing, speaking)
context.additional_context: Development of creative language teaching methods using VR/simulation tools in resource-constrained environments, emphasizing customized text analysis and expression strategies for medical settings.

learning_goals: Diagnose creative elements of existing language teaching methods and improve communication strategies by applying mixed research methods (quantitative + qualitative).
Design at least two creative language teaching methods to enhance learner engagement and clinical problem-solving skills in VR-based simulation environments.
Develop at least three formative assessment tools applicable in smartphone-based constrained technical environments and optimize feedback expression.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
